attributes.action: request the resignation of the Archbishop of Canterbury for his comments on Sharia Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned believe that the Archbishop's comments on Sharia law are incompatible with the prime mission of his position as the head of the Anglican communion, and the head of the Church of England.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
